title: Handle Tenant's Abandoned Personal Property
description: After a move-out, a tenant has left behind personal belongings. The PM must handle them according to state law.

tasks.description: Photograph and inventory all items left behind.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed list and photos of the abandoned items are created.

tasks.description: Look up the state-specific legal requirements for handling abandoned property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that a formal notice must be sent and the property stored for 30 days.

tasks.description: Send a 'Notice of Belief of Abandonment and Right to Reclaim Property' to the tenant's last known address.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct legal notice is generated and sent via certified mail.
